attributes.description:
Motordeal Prestige
Balance of service plan and warranty 
Dealers in quality pre-owned cars. Trade-ins welcome, finance available through all the major banks, Please note prices exclude admin, documentation, delivery and licensing costs. Deliveries nationwide. Refer someone and get paid a minimum of R 2000-R5000 for any successful referrals  The difference is in the quality. Call us now. Sell us your pre loved car before trading it in or outright sale, we will either meet or better any written quote.T&Cs apply.

attributes.description:
With VW Polokwane Master Cars we give our customers total peace of mind; every car is checked in our workshop by a qualified VW Technician and undergo a 80 point quality check . Everything that needs to be done is done to the vehicle before you take delivery. 

We are committed to making your purchase experience as easy as possible and are happy to take any trade-in, however old, organise finance for you and any of our other products that will help your ownership experience to be effortless.

Nation wide delivery

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.

attributes.description:
The awesome P series LS 4x2 
This vehicle has an 8 speed ZF automatic gearbox mated to a 2.0 turbo diesel engine producing 120 KW and 400 NM of torque
It has a synthetic leather interior finished in an executive diamond pattern.  
It comes standard with a 5yr/100 000 km service plan and warranty 
Speak to us today at CMH Haval Cape Town on how we can personalize this vehicle to match your unique personality
